name: Oriental-Creations
overview: Oriental-Creations.com - Online webstore dealing with ikat fabrics, suzani, decorative pillow covers made of ikat and suzani, decorative handmade boxes and other handicrafts from Orient. Here you can choose from a large variety of Ikat fabrics and Cushion covers to decorate your interior. Hand-woven, free of the chemical additives and stresses of power-loom production, are vastly different in appearance and feel from machine-made fabrics. Ikats are often symbols of status, wealth, power and prestige. Modern Uzbek adras ikats in cotton and silk are brightly colored with good imported natural dyes. Later we are planning to offer you different Accessories like small hats for teapot and over fabrics to decorate your kitchen. All fabrics have been embroidered by Uzbek masters with love, to bring pleasure and happiness to all people. The Uzbek pillow covers amaze with the skill of embroidery and variety of patterns, that is why they are so popular all over the world. Our team wishes you good luck and we hope that the current situation in the world financial markets and the situation as a whole would not cancel such little pleasures as beautifying your own home and adding some warmth and coziness in it using the ikat fabrics, suzanies . We ship worldwide and give a 30 day money-back guarantee.
